Package killdrluckygame

Class ComputerControlledPlayer

java.lang.Object
killdrluckygame.ComputerControlledPlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Player
public class ComputerControlledPlayer extends Object
The ComputerControlledPlayer class extends the AbstractPlayer class and represents a computer-controlled player in the game. It provides methods to retrieve player information and determine if the player is computer-controlled.
